definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The white racists tried to keep down the Indians by force.
sentences.chinese: 白人種族主義者企圖用武力壓服印第安人。

sentences.english: He has been branded anti-Semitic and a racist by a British judge.
sentences.chinese: 一位英國法官宣佈其爲反猶分子和種族主義者。

sentences.english: He says accusations of racism are smears that he has come to expect.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲指控他爲種族主義者是對他的意圖進行醜化。

sentences.english: "This guy is, I believe, a racist, " Beck said.
sentences.chinese: 貝克說“我認爲，這個人是一個種族主義者。”
只因我是個種族主義者。

sentences.english: My mother was a straight-up-and-down racist of a very marked kind.
sentences.chinese: 我母親是一個徹頭徹尾的明顯型種族主義者。

sentences.english: Indians who live in Australia is under threat from racists.
sentences.chinese: 在澳大利亞的印度人受到來自種族主義者的威脅。

sentences.english: Hatemongering is the predominant idea in the book by a racist.
sentences.chinese: 在種族主義者寫的書中，煽動仇恨是主要的觀點。

sentences.english: But conservatives and rightwingers are not the only racists.
sentences.chinese: 但是保守主義者和右翼分子並非唯一的種族主義者。
把國旗揮舞稱爲“種族主義者”是可笑的。

sentences.english: Even the racialist find it difficult to make out a case for apartheid.
sentences.chinese: 甚至種族主義者也很難提出有利於種族隔離的理由。

sentences.english: The embassy was attacked by a few radical racialists.
sentences.chinese: 大使館受到了幾個激進的種族主義者的襲擊。
